CHAT.comment: Hesitation phenomena have not been accurately transcribed in this data.

u.a: MOT tends to younger sibling . MOT takes first box from table
young sibling is in an infant seat placed out of camera view
MOT sits down on the floor and then opens box
CHI kneels down in front of box
CHI reaches for and removes book from box
CHI opens and closes book then holds it out towards MOT
MOT reaches out and takes book from CHI
CHI moves closer to MOT on the floor
MOT points at something on book cover . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
MOT points to picture . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
MOT points to picture . <aft> MOT looks at CHI
MOT looks at CHI and leans a little closer
MOT looks at book then at CHI
MOT looks over her shoulder at young sibling
CHI leans forward and looks down
CHI moves up and down on his knees
CHI continues to look at the book
CHI rocks back and forth while holding his foot
CHI holds MOT knee with one hand
MOT looks at CHI while pointing
CHI leans forward and looks down at book
CHI holds on to his foot and leans on MOT
MOT looks at CHI . <2> MOT points to picture
CHI leans forward and looks down at book
CHI leans forward then sits back on his heels
MOT looks at CHI and points then holds hand out in squeeze gesture
<bef> MOT looks at book . MOT looks at CHI
CHI looks while scratching his neck
CHI pulls on the collar of his jacket
<1-2> MOT reaches over and touches CHI head then picks up a small patch of CHI hair between her fingers
CHI fidgets with the sleeve of his jacket
CHI shakes head no then looks at MOT
<bef> MOT looks over shoulder then back at book
MOT looks over at infant in the corner
CHI rests one hand on MOT knee while looking at book
<bef> MOT looks at book . MOT points then looks at CHI
CHI moves closer to MOT while looking at book
MOT points to picture . <aft> MOT out arm and makes a pulling gesture
CHI leans closer to MOT then sits back on his heels
MOT looks up and points to something in room
CHI gets up on his knees and reaches for book
MOT looks up and nods her head
CHI leans back and sits on his heels after turning the page
CHI points in the air in the direction of the book
CHI shakes head from side to side
CHI continues to look at book
CHI leans back holding his foot in his hand
CHI leans closer to MOT and sits next to her on the floor
CHI leans into MOT lap moving his face closer to the book
MOT kisses the top of CHI head as he leans forward
CHI buries his head in MOT lap
CHI leans away from MOT and sits on his heels next to her
CHI rests his hand on MOT knee
MOT points then looks over at CHI
MOT points and looks over at CHI
CHI leans forward on his knees looking down
CHI leans back on his heels
MOT makes a gesture with her hand and looks at CHI
CHI looks down then up at MOT
MOT points and looks over at CHI
<1-6 .> MOT points . <aft> MOT looks over at CHI
MOT points to picture . <4 .> MOT looks at CHI
MOT continues to look at book
MOT turns page and it is the end of the book
CHI leans forward and points then leans back on his heels
CHI leans forward and reaches for book
CHI looks down then across the room
CHI begins to get up and walks across room
MOT puts the book in the box it was in and moves it aside
CHI walks over to the table
CHI takes box down from table and walks toward MOT
CHI kneels and places box on the floor
MOT and CHI sit facing each other with box between them
CHI attempts to open the box
MOT reaches toward the box . <aft> MOT help CHI open box
MOT lifts cover off of the box
CHI helps MOT lift cover off the box
MOT moves cover of box to the side
CHI reaches into box and gets a puppet
CHI puts puppet on his hand
MOT reaches into box and gets a puppet
MOT puts puppet on her hand
MOT holds Cookie_Monster puppet out and grabs CHI puppet with her puppet
MOT reaches for CHI face with her puppet
CHI leans back a little to get away from puppet
MOT brings puppet back towards herself
MOT opens and closes her puppets mouth
MOT reaches for and removes puppet from CHI hand
CHI reaches for puppet then puts it on his hand
MOT reads name label on the puppet
MOT reaches for puppet on CHI hand
MOT fixes puppet on CHI hand
<$=1> MOT feels for CHI thumb in puppet
<$=1> MOT adjusts CHI's puppet on his hand
MOT leans back and puts her puppet on
CHI looks down with puppet facing him
MOT plays with puppet in front of CHI
CHI turns his puppet so it faces him and moves its mouth then holds it out in front of him
MOT puts her puppet over CHI puppet
CHI leans back and withdraws puppet
CHI reaches for MOT puppet with his own
MOT pulls her puppet back away from CHI reach
CHI leans forward and reaches for MOT parrot
CHI tries to capture MOT puppet
MOT moves puppet around then reaches for CHI with puppet
MOT touches CHI face with puppet
MOT holds puppet out in front of her
CHI grabs MOT puppet with his free hand then attacks MOT puppet with his puppet
MOT pulls her puppet away then hugs it
CHI sits back on his heels and looks at MOT
MOT reaches for CHI with puppet and tickles him
CHI falls back on the floor
MOT reaches out with her puppet and plays with CHI
CHI reaches for MOT puppet again
MOT touches CHI face with puppet
CHI gets up on his knees and kneels in the box on the floor in front of him
MOT moves box away to the side
CHI moves closer to MOT on his knees
MOT reaches for and tickles CHI with her puppet
CHI falls backward and puts his hands up
CHI moves toward MOT and reaches out for her puppet
CHI reaches out for MOT puppet and holds it in his puppet's mouth
MOT moves her puppet into her lap and looks at CHI
CHI looks up then reaches for MOT puppet in her lap
CHI leans down hard with his puppet on MOT puppet in her lap
CHI looks at puppet then reaches for MOT puppet
MOT goes after CHI with her puppet and tickles him
CHI falls back on floor while MOT tickles him with her puppet
<$=3> MOT holds her puppet out and tickles CHI
MOT reaches for CHI with her puppet
CHI gets up on his knees and moves across room
MOT puts her puppet in the box
CHI puts his puppet in the box
CHI gets up and walks across room
CHI walks back across room and puts new box on floor in front of MOT and kneels down
<aft> MOT places box top to the side
CHI reaches into box and then grabs crayons in box
CHI takes a piece of paper out of the box
<$=1> MOT moves top of box over and puts piece of paper on top
CHI puts crayon on paper and presses down
CHI leans back away from paper and looks at crayon
CHI leans forward and presses down
CHI reaches for another crayon and looks at it
CHI presses down on the crayon on top of the paper
CHI makes a circle . <aft> CHI sits back and looks at drawing
CHI leans back and shakes head yes
CHI leans back and looks around
CHI looks around room for another crayon
<bef> MOT points to crayon beside CHI
CHI picks up another crayon and begins to color
CHI points to his nose and looks up
MOT points to part of the paper
CHI leans back and looks up from drawing
<aft> CHI leans back and looks up at MOT
CHI leans back and looks up at MOT
CHI leans back and looks up at MOT
CHI leans back and looks down
CHI looks around then up at MOT
CHI leans back and points with crayon
MOT looks at CHI . <aft> MOT looks down then over her shoulder at infant in corner
CHI leans back and looks down . CHI looks up at MOT
MOT looks over her shoulder at infant in corner
<aft> CHI leans back and looks up
CHI stops coloring briefly then begins again
CHI looks around then picks up another crayon off the floor
CHI points while scratching his head
CHI looks up and nods head yes
MOT reaches out with one hand
CHI hands a crayon to MOT
CHI looks while scratching his head
MOT leans back and looks at CHI
CHI stands up and begins to walk across room
End of PCI - Crayons and Paper
CHI returns and kneels down putting the crayons back in the box
CHI reaches for and puts the last crayon in the box
CHI stands up and walks away
MOT holds up drawing before closing box
CHI is out of camera range
MOT puts the box off to one side but keeps out the picture they drew
CHI removes another box from the table and spills the contents on the floor at his feet
MOT looks up while remaining seated on the floor
CHI moves over to where he dropped the toy house and kneels down on the floor next to MOT
MOT moves house in front of CHI
CHI back is to the camera
MOT moves some of the toy house furniture around
MOT removes something from house and looks up
CHI back is to the camera blocking a clear view of his actions and making it difficult to hear what he is saying
MOT points toward side of house
CHI looks at something in his hand
CHI leans back on his heels
MOT nods her head in direction she refers to
CHI drives the car into the garage
MOT looks at toys then at CHI . <1-3> MOT points to table
MOT looks at CHI then away
CHI looks over his shoulder then back towards house
CHI leans forward and picks up a toy bed
CHI puts toy in the house
MOT points to room in toy house
MOT leans back and looks down
CHI plays with toys in front of him
CHI reaches for toys and puts them in the house
CHI leans back on his heels
CHI picks up some toys and places them in the house
there is a long silence as CHI places toys in house
CHI continues to put toys into house
MOT leans back with her hands on her knees
CHI continues to play with toys
MOT leans forward and looks at CHI
CHI turns to face the toy house
